desc: 50% boost to Atk and 10% boost to critical hit rate when BB gauge is over 50% & critical damage considerably boosts BB gauge. *Activates Guild Raid skill

dictionary.lore: Named after the Vardket deity of slavery and sacrifice, this paw-shaped amulet enhances one's strikes beyond the norm, allowing them to draw upon reserves of strength that they never thought possible. Care, however, must be taken by the bearer with their newly-endowed strength - lest their caresses crush bone and steel.

name: Ke'hret's Paw
